Name: Furry Love & Sex
About the game: Furry Love & Sex is a dating sim story-driven Visual Novel with elements of a match3 gameplay. Claw, the main character, performed dirty work for the evil corporation for a while. When the time came for his payment, Claw suddenly found himself on their hit list instead. Miraculously surviving, he is now set on repaying the debt. Choose your moves carefully, as they affect you and your opponent differently. Features: Complex dating sim gameplay mixed with a story-driven Visual Novel. Life2D animated characters Beautiful background artwork Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls A Multitude of Sexy Situations
